languages.text: "Запрос отклонен ввиду нарушения Девятого Универсального Закона: Ксеногенный Механизм есть Искажение Истинного Пути". {n}В голосе Паскаля звучит обреченность.{/n}
"Request denied due to violation of the Ninth Universal Law: the Alien Mechanism is a Perversion of the True Path." {n}There is resignation in Pasqal's voice.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Запрос отклонен ввиду нарушения Девятого Универсального Закона: Ксеногенный Механизм есть Искажение Истинного Пути". {n}В голосе Паскаля звучит обреченность.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Request denied due to violation of the Ninth Universal Law: the Alien Mechanism is a Perversion of the True Path." {n}There is resignation in Pasqal's voice.{/n}

languages.text: 「第九宇宙法違反により要求は拒否されました。異星人のメカニズムは、真の道を曲解したものです」{n}パスカルの声にはあきらめの色が混じっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Request denied due to violation of the Ninth Universal Law: the Alien Mechanism is a Perversion of the True Path." {n}There is resignation in Pasqal's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「第九宇宙法違反により要求は拒否されました。異星人のメカニズムは、真の道を曲解したものです」{n}パスカルの声にはあきらめの色が混じっている。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “请求已拒绝，此请求违反普适准则第九条：异型机械是对真理的曲解。”{n}帕斯卡的声音中充满了无奈。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Request denied due to violation of the Ninth Universal Law: the Alien Mechanism is a Perversion of the True Path." {n}There is resignation in Pasqal's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “请求已拒绝，此请求违反普适准则第九条：异型机械是对真理的曲解。”{n}帕斯卡的声音中充满了无奈。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Petición denegada debido a la violación de la novena Ley Universal: el mecanismo alienígena es una perversión del camino verdadero». {n}Notas resignación en la voz de Pasqal.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Request denied due to violation of the Ninth Universal Law: the Alien Mechanism is a Perversion of the True Path." {n}There is resignation in Pasqal's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Petición denegada debido a la violación de la novena Ley Universal: el mecanismo alienígena es una perversión del camino verdadero». {n}Notas resignación en la voz de Pasqal.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Anfrage abgewiesen, aufgrund eines Verstoßes gegen das Neunte Universalgesetz: Der Alien-Mechanismus ist eine Perversion des Wahren Pfads." {n}In Pasqals Stimme liegt Resignation.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Request denied due to violation of the Ninth Universal Law: the Alien Mechanism is a Perversion of the True Path." {n}There is resignation in Pasqal's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Anfrage abgewiesen, aufgrund eines Verstoßes gegen das Neunte Universalgesetz: Der Alien-Mechanismus ist eine Perversion des Wahren Pfads." {n}In Pasqals Stimme liegt Resignation.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Demande refusée en raison d'une violation de la neuvième loi universelle : le mécanisme alien est une perversion de la voie véritable, » {n}énonce Pasqal avec résignation.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Request denied due to violation of the Ninth Universal Law: the Alien Mechanism is a Perversion of the True Path." {n}There is resignation in Pasqal's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Demande refusée en raison d'une violation de la neuvième loi universelle : le mécanisme alien est une perversion de la voie véritable, » {n}énonce Pasqal avec résignation.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Talep, 'Uzaylı Mekanizmaları, Gerçek Yol'un Saptırılmasından doğar.' ifadesini içeren Dokuzuncu Evrensel Yasa'yı çiğnediği için reddedildi." {n}Pasqal'ın sesi, durumu kabullendiğini belli ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Request denied due to violation of the Ninth Universal Law: the Alien Mechanism is a Perversion of the True Path." {n}There is resignation in Pasqal's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Dokuzuncu Evrensel Yasa'yı çiğnediği için talep reddedildi: Uzaylı Mekanizmaları, Gerçek Yol'un Saptırılmasından doğar." {n}Durumu kabullenişi Pasqal'ın sesinden belli oluyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
